document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Host plants. On lucerne (
Farahbakhsh 1961
;
Modarres Awal 1997 b
;
Askari et al . 2009
;
Hassanzadeh et al . 2009 a
, b ), lupine, wheat (
Farahbakhsh 1961
;
Modarres Awal 1997 b
),
Hordeum
sp. (
Modarres Awal 1996 b
,
1997 b
), poplar, sugar-beet (
Modarres Awal 1997 b
), Asteraceae ,
Apiaceae (
Linnavuori 2008
)
, dill and licorice (
Khaghaninia et al . 2010 b
), Circium sp.,
Triticum aestivum
( Poaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
), in alfalfa field (
Farshbaf Pour-Abad 2000
;
Khalilzadeh 2008
), in pistachio garden (
Zeinoddini Memand et al . 2012
, 2013 ), also caught on
Alhagi
sp. ( Fabaceae ),
Salsola
sp. ( Salsolaceae ),
Peganum
sp.,
Zygophyllum
sp. (both Zygophyllaceae ) (
Zeinoddini Memand et al . 2013
).
